```{r}
#| label: load-packages
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
#| label: load-data
edu_achievement <- read_excel(
  "data/educationachievement.xlsx",
  skip = 1
)
glimpse(edu_achievement)
```

```{r}
#| label: g3-failures-scatterplot
ggplot(edu_achievement, aes(x = failures, y=G3)) +
  geom_point()
```
